summary:
This year I've reverse engineered two HTTP/Web enabled devices and
written python clients for them. The Belkin Wemo [1] and the Philips Hue
[2]. My poster session will cover methods materials and work.

[1] http://www.issackelly.com/blog/2012/08/04/wemo-api-hacking/ [2]
http://www.issackelly.com/blog/2012/11/10/philips-hue-api-hacking/
title: Reverse Engineering the Internet of Things
